hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) granted a concession to Zubair bin ‘Awwam and ‘Abdur-Rahman bin ‘Auf, allowing them to wear silk shirts, because of a rash they were suffering from

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ رُخِّصَ لَهُ فِي لُبْسِ الْحَرِيرِ
chapter.eng-name: One who is granted a concession allowing him to wear silk
